title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Grand Teton National Park, Wyoming
content:
Photo submitted by Tim Young, “Here is a photo of WB, a great friend and biking buddy of over 40 years. We were off on a Juneteenth/Summer Solstice bike adventure in Grand Teton National Park with a group friends, this was WB’s first tour on his sweet new Moots Routt 45.” We always love seeing […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Grand Teton National Park, Wyoming appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
